author: USA TODAY, Gabrielle Canon, USA TODAY
title: California had its deadliest day Wednesday, even as COVID-19 cases start to stabilize
description: The governor also announced new programs to help Californians with the financial hardship caused by the COVID-19 crisis.
content:
Gov. Gavin Newsom announced Friday that California is now "in a pandemic-induced recession," amid the coronavirus outbreak. In an attempt to ease the economic fallout, Newsom said he has selected advisors to aid in the economic recovery effort. (April 17)
